General.Name: Novavest Real Estate Ag
General.Description: Novavest Real Estate AG engages in the real estate activities in Switzerland. It develops, rents, and manages residential properties, office and commercial properties, shopping centers, cinemas, hotels, and industrial plants. Novavest Real Estate AG was founded in 2012 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
